column4: I have a dead, once windows laptop, the bootfile became corrupt, and I was hoping to give ubuntu a go.  I downloaded the "desktop" iso, made the CD but seem unable to boot/install directly from it.  Might someone direct me to the correct download?
on the widows comp Im on now, through roxio
okay lemme back up.. I am ignorant as to linux.... I think I need to load something else into the dead pc first to use the ubuntu cd install... but I dont know what

No, you won't.  Unless the comptuer can't boot to the CD (which would be odd).  You may have to push something like F12 or del or something when booting to be able to change your boot order and boot of the CD
